inlineContent.text: Splatalyzer is a Swift package that enables the analysis of Splatoon 3 builds. It also provides structures representing main weapons, sub weapons, special weapons, gear builds, abilities and more.
Along side this are SwiftUI views displaying this information and picking build characteristics.
Learn more about how the package decodes and proccesses data.
